content:
Ad Hoc is a digital services company that helps the federal government better serve people. Our work enables agencies to meet the needs of their users while closing the gap between consumer expectations and government. We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer with enthusiasm for advancing FHIR standards. This role will assist in building APIs that support both the digital services we deliver as well as third-party usage.

https://boards.greenhouse.io/adhocteam/jobs/4803922002

(US Citizens only)
